steps.text: Start engine and allow it to idle.

Press the accelerator pedal once quickly down to
the limit stop and immediately release it again. The measurement
should not take longer than one second.

Download Setup file (the Tech 32 uses only Setup
files, no reference curves).
Start engine and allow it to idle.

Press the accelerator pedal once quickly down to
the limit stop and immediately release it again. The measurement
should not take longer than one second.
